title: my account was stolen
body: my account one stolen it and i cant change my password and emil bec my emil i forget it but i have my username and password of account but i need to change my password and emil plz help!!

replies.body: We can help!  Reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we'll help with updating your information.  We're a little back up at the moment, but we'll get back to you as soon as we can.  Hang tight!
ok but how can i change the password and email
